metadata.description: Modular resume components for Derek Simmons using WHO methodology

personalBrand.tagline: Strategic Innovation Catalyst | Cross-Domain Pattern Recognition | Ethical AI Implementation
personalBrand.elevator: Executive leader who recognizes patterns across domains that most see as unrelated, generating $20M+ in revenue by bridging human wisdom with technological advancement.
valueProps: Connect disparate domains to create unexpected value
Translate between specialists across technical, creative, and business concerns
Identify patterns others miss to spot opportunities earlier
Implement frameworks that scale beyond individual problems
Balance vision with execution across strategic and tactical levels

cwoFounder.what: Founded Claude Wisdom Strategies, developing conversational AI and ethical implementation frameworks
cwoFounder.how: Created The CW Standard methodology for human-centered AI integration and cross-domain pattern recognition systems
cwoFounder.outcome: Established consulting practice positioning technology as enhancement rather than replacement of human capability

mediaFranchise.what: Pioneered Media Franchise Model treating content verticals as entrepreneurial business units
mediaFranchise.how: Applied cross-domain business principles to reimagine traditional content strategy with independent P&L accountability
mediaFranchise.outcome: Generated $15M+ in new revenue streams through innovative sponsorship and content monetization

digitalTransformation.what: Led comprehensive digital transformation at Star Tribune Media (1,000+ employees)
digitalTransformation.how: Developed AI Task Force, implemented SalesGPT automation, and orchestrated enterprise-wide technology adoption
digitalTransformation.outcome: Drove digital subscription growth to 100,000+ (top 6 nationally) while reclaiming 2.5 work-years annually through automation

aiEthics.what: Developed comprehensive frameworks for ethical AI implementation across organizations
aiEthics.how: Created systematic methodologies ensuring technology augments human judgment rather than replacing decision-making
aiEthics.outcome: Established industry-leading approach to responsible AI adoption with measurable business impact

crossDomainLeadership.what: Built high-performing teams across media, technology, and sports coaching domains
crossDomainLeadership.how: Applied pattern recognition to identify transferable leadership principles across seemingly unrelated fields
crossDomainLeadership.outcome: Hired and developed 50+ professionals with 75% college scholarship success rate in sports coaching

patternRecognition.what: Identified and documented patterns connecting media transformation, sports coaching, AI implementation, and strategic leadership
patternRecognition.how: Developed frameworks (FloShake, CW Standard) that apply insights from one domain to solve problems in another
patternRecognition.outcome: Created systematic approaches for navigating complex transitions across multiple industries

aiAndTechnology: Large language model research and application

recognition.ranking: Top 5 global ranking (Society for News Design)

published.title: Poynter Institute: Local Edition Business Strategy
Pulitzer Center Award Entry: A Matter of Dignity
LA Times L.A. Affairs: Finding Love
